body: I have discovered a new game that i very much enjoy that some of you anime loves might like. Its called lost saga. Lost saga is a 3-D fighting game that includes animie characters, different gamemodes and monster dungeons! It is extremely addicting and fun... Almost more addicting then avicus... Nvm nothing is more addicting then avicus, anyway getting back on topic. It includes a virtual shop, friend list, and pets. I just started playing and could use some pointers, I also play with my friend that also plays avicus, danyman2202 also plays Lost Saga. If any of you that are reading this forum post play Lost Saga, friend add me on the game, my Lost Saga IGN is PorkyHD exactly spelled like i did spell it. So i hope i find some people here that play this game and i hope i see you there! :D
